mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_payment_history (user_id, class_id, payment_date, price, refund_status) VALUES (#{userId}, #{classId}, NOW(), #{price}, #{refundStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT uph.payment_id, uph.user_id, uph.class_id, c.class_title, DATE_FORMAT(uph.payment_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS paymentDate, uph.price, uph.refund_status AS refundStatus FROM user_payment_history uph JOIN class c ON uph.class_id = c.class_id WHERE uph.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY uph.payment_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE user_payment_history SET refund_status = #{refundStatus} WHERE payment_id = #{paymentId}
